data.title: Microsoft, OpenAI, and a US Teachers’ Union Are Hatching a Plan to ‘Bring AI into the Classroom’
data.description: The National Academy for AI Instruction will make artificial intelligence training accessible to educators across the country, according to leaked details.

data.title: GM’s Cruise Cars Are Back on the Road in 3 US States—but Not for Ride-Hailing
data.description: After sightings by WIRED, GM confirms that a limited number of sensor-laden Bolt EVs have been given a second life.

data.title: 15 Best Tablets (2025), Tested and Reviewed
data.description: We’ve tested all the top slates, from Apple’s iPads to Android and Windows devices, and rounded up our favorites.
